flavorText:
"I watched with my own eyes as Jari Eagle-Caller fell from these cliffs, only to be snatched from the air by a giant bird!"
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie Jari der Adlerrufer von diesen Klippen fiel und von einem Riesenvogel aus der Luft geschnappt wurde!"
—Iskene, Kannah-Geschichtenerzählerin
foreignData.name: Instabiler Fjord
foreignData.text:

Der Instabile Fjord kommt getappt ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¡Vi con mis propios ojos cómo Jari, el Llamaáguilas, se caía desde estos precipicios y un pájaro gigante lo atrapaba al vuelo!".
—Iskene, cuentacuentos kannah
foreignData.name: Fiordo inestable
foreignData.text:

foreignData.flavorText:
« J'ai vu Jari Cri-d'aigle tomber de ces falaises de mes propres yeux, avant qu'il se fasse attraper dans les airs par un oiseau géant ! »
—Iskene, conteuse des Kannah
foreignData.name: Fjord volatile
foreignData.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}.)

foreignData.flavorText:

—Iskene, cantastorie Kannah
foreignData.name: Fiordo Instabile
foreignData.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}.)
Il Fiordo Instabile entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.

foreignData.flavorText:
「私はこの目で見ていました。鷲呼びのヤーリがこの崖から飛び降り、巨大な鳥に空中で掴まれる場面を！」
――カナーの語り部、イスキン

（{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。）
移り変わるフィヨルドはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreignData.flavorText:
"난 독수리조련사 야리가 이 절벽에서 떨어지는 것을, 그리고는 거대한 새가 이내 그를 공중에서 낚아채는 걸 내 눈으로 직접 눈으로 지켜봤다고!"
—카나 이야기꾼, 이스킨
foreignData.name: 변덕스러운 피오르드
foreignData.text:
({T}: {U} 또는 {R}를 추가한다.)
변덕스러운 피오르드는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vi com meus próprios olhos quando Jari Chama-águia caiu deste penhasco e foi apanhado em pleno ar por um pássaro gigante!"
— Iskene, contadora de histórias kannah
foreignData.name: Fjord Volátil

foreignData.flavorText:
«Я своими глазами видела, как Яри Заклинатель Орлов упал с этого утеса, но в воздухе его подхватила огромная птица!»
— Искени, каннская сказительница

name: Volatile Fjord
originalText:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Volatile Fjord enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Volatile Fjord enters the battlefield tapped.
